name: historic
description:
The historic command extracts historic features from OSM data. Categories include:

- Monument: monuments, memorials, statues, plaques
- Building: castles, palaces, forts, ruins, archaeological sites
- Military: battlefields, bunkers, cannons, wrecks
- Industrial: mines, mills, kilns, historic railways
- Other: tombs, cemeteries, wayside crosses

Includes heritage protection status and Wikipedia links.

options.-t, --type: Filter by historic type (e.g., castle, monument)
options.-c, --category: Filter by category: monument, building, military, industrial, other
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Historic features with:
- historic: Feature type
- name: Site name
- description: Site description
- start_date: Construction/event date
- heritage: Heritage protection status
- wikipedia: Wikipedia article link
